column1: Smoque BBQ////Two small containers had BBQ (one was Memphis style and one was North Carolina style
column2: I think.)  I liked them both.  Brisket was great.  Mac and cheese was good but awfully small portion.  Peach Cobbler was good (I don't recall having Peach Cobbler before
column3: so I wasn't sure what to expect.) It was also a very small portion.
